name: Animated Spinner
description:
This spinner is made by using autolayout and maks.


I highly recommend checking the alternatives versions. Those may be easier to use, understand, customize, and it may provide better performance.

  1. Two Steps
  2. Three Steps (most lightweight)
  3. Delayed Steps (easiest to built)
